name: Business Simulator 2
description:
ManageOS creating a better life for you and your business.

Introducing Business Simulator 2!

A much better game than Business Simulator. Invest your profit and make more profit! Although the graphics aren't great, they will be improved in the future. I hope you enjoy this when it is ready to be released.

FAQs

Q: It says that there is local multiplayer, where is it? A: Local multiplayer is a feature that to be added soon Q: Where did the music come from? A: To find out press "Credits" on the main menu or read this; The music heard in the game is from <a href="http://incompetech.com" target="_blank">incompetech.com</a>. Check it out! There are many different genres of music on there.</span></span> Q: I found a bug! What should I do? A: Oh no! Not another bug! :( If you encounter one of these horrible creatures, please report it in the <a href="https://benjiplaysdevelopment.freshdesk.com" target="_blank">support system</a>.</span>
